applications.title: AI Engineer
applications.instructions:
1. Navigate to https://jobs.lever.co/scribd/ai-engineer-abc123
2. Click "Apply for this job" button
3. Fill form fields:
   - Full Name: John Doe
   - Email: john.doe@example.com
   - Phone: +1-555-123-4567
   - Resume: Upload file "output/Scribd_AI_Engineer.pdf"
   - Additional Information: "Please see my resume for detailed experience"
4. **PAUSE at Submit button** - Wait for user confirmation

applications.title: ML Engineer
applications.instructions:
1. Navigate to https://jobs.greenhouse.io/anthropic/ml-engineer-def456
2. Click "Apply" or "Submit Application" button
3. Fill form fields:
   - First Name: John
   - Last Name: Doe
   - Email: john.doe@example.com
   - Phone: +1-555-123-4567
   - Resume: Upload file "output/Anthropic_ML_Engineer.pdf"
   - LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/johndoe
4. Answer any screening questions (use best judgment or skip optional)
5. **PAUSE at Submit button** - Wait for user confirmation

applications.title: Applied AI Researcher
applications.instructions:
1. Navigate to https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/3845678901
2. Click "Easy Apply" button (if available) or "Apply" button
3. For Easy Apply:
   - Resume: Upload file "output/OpenAI_Applied_AI_Res.pdf"
   - Answer screening questions
   - Step through wizard
4. For External Apply:
   - Fill form on company website
   - Use Email: john.doe@example.com, Phone: +1-555-123-4567
5. **PAUSE at final Submit/Review step** - Wait for user confirmation
